Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 29th overall pick, by Chicago in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/1/2015, off George Davenport (SLB)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/14/2015, off Martin Pryce (BOS)...
Injured on 5/27/2015 with a Hyper Extended Knee, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/14/2015, hitting .345 with 6 HR, 11 RBI...
Injured on 9/18/2015 with a Strained Rib Cage Muscle, out for one week...
Won Gold Glove at Leftfield in 2016...
